name: Entrance Hall
description: You are standing in the grand entrance hall. Sunlight streams through dusty windows.

floor.name: Floor
floor.description: The marble floor is cracked and worn, with years of footsteps etched into its surface.

walls.name: Walls
walls.description: Faded wallpaper peels from the walls, revealing glimpses of ancient plaster beneath.

ceiling.name: Ceiling
ceiling.description: The high ceiling disappears into shadows above.

interactables.name: Grandfather Clock
interactables.description: A towering grandfather clock, its pendulum frozen in time.

containers.name: Clock Compartment
containers.description: A small door on the clock's face

name: Library
description: A dusty old library with shelves full of books.

floor.name: Floor
floor.description: The wooden floorboards creak beneath your feet, worn smooth by countless footsteps.

walls.name: Walls
walls.description: Floor-to-ceiling bookshelves line every wall, packed with leather-bound volumes.

ceiling.name: Ceiling
ceiling.description: A brass chandelier hangs from ornate ceiling roses.

interactables.name: Writing Desk
interactables.description: A mahogany writing desk with several drawers.

containers.name: Desk Drawer
containers.description: A drawer with a brass handle

name: Kitchen
description: A dingy kitchen with a broken stove. Looking at the utensils and cutlery strewn across the counters and floor, it looks like people were in a rush to leave...

floor.name: Floor
floor.description: The stone floor is stained and scattered with broken crockery.

walls.name: Walls
walls.description: Copper pots and pans hang from hooks on the walls, some badly tarnished.

ceiling.name: Ceiling
ceiling.description: Blackened beams cross the ceiling, smoke-stained from years of cooking fires.
